With the intense competition that has ensued in this industry, games are now rapidly incorporating sophisticated technologies, which include the recent advances in wearable head-mounted displays, Trends </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;c7bcbfe7.1502</link>   <description> *Internet of Things (IoT): Zoom-In to Future Research Trends*<br><br>It is a pleasure to invite you to consider submitting an original research<br>papers, critical survey articles and short notes for possible publication<br>in our * Sensors &amp; Transducers *journal's issue devoted to Internet of<br>Things (IoT) future research trends and supporting technologies. The title<br>of this issue is: '*Internet of Things (IoT): Zoom-In to Future Research<br>Trends'.* [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-28T17:41:37+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Yaser Jararweh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;c7bcbfe7.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;6af45f64.1502">   <title>Call for Abstracts/Participation: EURO 2015 stream on Data Science for Optimisation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;6af45f64.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>The 27th European Conference on Operational Research, EURO 2015<br>(http://www.euro2015.org/) will take place in Glasgow, on July 12-15th, we<br>will be organising a stream on<br><br>&quot;Data Science for Optimisation&quot;.<br><br>We invite you to contribute to one of the following sessions within the Data<br>Science for Optimisation Stream:<br><br>- Adaptive Runtime Operator Selection and Hyper-heuristics (invitation code:<br>2d033f15) [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T10:16:46-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ender Ozcan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;6af45f64.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;1758cc9e.1502">   <title>COMEDAI 2015 - CALL FOR PAPERS </a></description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T09:46:02+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>IDC Conference</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;1758cc9e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;94a8e72d.1502">   <title>Early Bird deadline: IEEE Technically Sponsored SAI Intelligent Systems Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;94a8e72d.1502</link>   <description> IEEE Technically Sponsored SAI Intelligent Systems Conference 2015<br>(IntelliSys 2015)<br>November 10-11, 2015<br>London, UK<br>www.SAIConference.com/IntelliSys2015<br><br>The Science and Information Organization is hosting the SAI Intelligent<br>Systems Conference (IntelliSys 2015) from November 10-11, 2015 in London,<br>UK. This conference will focus in areas of *intelligent systems and<br>artificial intelligence* and how it applies to the real world. It is an<br>opportunity for researchers in this field to meet and discuss solutions,<br>scientific results, and methods in solving intriguing problems in this<br>field. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-25T12:52:40+05:30</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Supriya Kapoor</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;94a8e72d.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;8e31bef3.1502">   <title>CfP: ECADA 2015 @GECCO 2015 in Madrid, Spain distributed-ai@jiscmail.ac.uk </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;8e31bef3.1502</link>   <description> 5th Workshop on Evolutionary Computation for the Automated Design of<br>Algorithms (ECADA)<br><br>Only six weeks to go before papers are due (April, 3 2015).<br><br>July 11-15, 2015 @ GECCO 2015 in Madrid, Spain<br><br>http://web.mst.edu/~tauritzd/ECADA/<br><br>CALL FOR PAPERS<br><br>The ECADA workshop explores the Automated Design of Algorithms employing<br>hyper-heuristics which are meta-heuristics applied to algorithm space, with<br>an emphasis on hyper-heuristics of the evolutionary computation persuasion.<br>Genetic Programming has most famously been employed to this end, but random<br>search and iterative hill-climbing have both also successfully been<br>employed to automatically design novel (components of) algorithms. These<br>methods have the advantage of [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-25T07:07:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>John Woodward</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;8e31bef3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;57097bf9.1502">   <title>IDC 2015 - [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-17T10:04:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;512f037e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;9e858077.1502">   <title>CFP - Special Issue on Principles and Practices in Multi-Agent Systems </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;9e858077.1502</link>   <description> CALL FOR PAPERS<br>Scalable Computing: Practice and Experience<br>(www.scpe.org)<br><br>Special Issue: Principles and Practices in Multi-Agent Systems<br><br>Agent-based Computing addresses the challenges in managing distributed<br>computing systems and networks through monitoring, communication,<br>consensus-based decision-making and coordinated actuation. As a result,<br>intelligent agents and multi-agent systems have demonstrated the<br>capability to use intelligence, knowledge representation and reasoning,<br>and other social metaphors like \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdtrust\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdgame\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdinstitution\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, to<br>not only address real-world problems in a human-like way but to<br>transcend human performance. This conference will focus in areas of *intelligent systems and<br>artificial intelligence* and how it applies to the real world. It is an<br>opportunity for researchers in this field to meet and discuss solutions,<br>scientific results, and methods in solving intriguing problems in this<br>field. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T23:05:58+05:30</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Supriya Kapoor</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;e444adb1.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;e5a2528f.1502">   <title>Final invitation to BioCentre's panel discussion on the future of work and robotics </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;e5a2528f.1502</link>   <description> ** Apologies for any cross posting **<br><br>This is a final notification of the forthcoming discussion BioCentre is hosting on the future of employment and robotics.<br><br>We would be delighted to have you attend this panel discussion which focuses on encouraging engagement with and dialogue on an important issue affecting our future.   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-02T10:43:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>BioCentre Matt James</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISTRIBUTED-AI;e5a2528f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
